tossup_question: 37) BIOLOGY   In the ABC model, what flower organ corresponds to floral meristem with A genes active and B and C genes inactive?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Stamen
X) Sepal
Y) Petal
Z) Carpal
bonus_question: 37) BIOLOGY  Which of the following statements is least accurate regarding Barr bodies in most mammalian cells?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Barr bodies are inactive X chromosomes in female somatic cells
X) The choice of which X chromosome becomes a Barr body is random
Y) In cells with multiple X chromosomes, only one becomes a Barr body
Z) The addition of an extra Xic can create an active X chromosome in male cells
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Y) In cells with multiple X chromosomes only one become a Barr body
